resources.string: Enter an amount inferior or equal to the original transaction
The refund has been sent to %1$s
Your reminder has been sent to %1$s.
We\'re sorry, we encountered an issue loading your activity.
We\'re sorry, we encountered an issue loading your customers.
It may take a few minutes to appear on your activity list.
We\'re sorry, we\'re unable to record the payment. Please try again.
We\'re sorry, we\'re unable to complete your refund.
We\'re sorry, we\'re unable to complete this refund.
We\'re sorry, the recipient is unable to receive payments. Please contact Customer Service for assistance.
You\'ve already issued a refund for this transaction.
We\'re sorry, we’re unable to complete refunds after 90 days of the original transaction
You\'ve already issued a partial refund. Please enter a new amount.
We\'re sorry, your account is restricted. Please contact Customer Service for assistance.
We\'re sorry, the recipient’s account is restricted. We are unable to complete the payment.
We\'re sorry, the recipient is unable to receive payments. Please contact Customer Service for assistance.
We\'re sorry, we\'re unable to delete your invoice. Please try again.
The refund amount exceeds your available PayPal balance. Please transfer money to your balance.
It doesn\'t seem like you can send email from this device.
It doesn\'t seem like you can send a text message from this device.
We\'re sorry, we encountered an issue loading your payment history. Please try again.
There\'s no activity to display right now.\n\nYour payments, invoices and other account activity will display here.
We\'re sorry, we\'re unable to load your history. Please swipe down to try again.
You do not have enough funds in your PayPal balance to cover this refund. The full refund amount will automatically come from %1$s and will take 3-5 business days to complete.
If you do not have a sufficient PayPal balance to cover the refund, the rest of the payment will come from your default payment method.
We\'re sorry, we were unable to record this refund. Please try again.
